Posts.Content: Just finished round one of TC, Herceptin and Perjeta.. ooh and how could I forget the the Neulaster injection  ..... I’m into Day 6 and have only really had one bad day .. I have had small strange things happening, but not complaining.. big loves to everyone else going through this ..
Posts.Title: Hellooooo

Posts.Content: Thanks for the reply .. yes HER2 and ER pos ... well if you have one you might as well have the other lol  Glad to hear that good results have been achieved on these combo drugs, makes me feel like I made the right choice.
Posts.Title: Hellooooo
